awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 3 wins & 2 nominations.

fullplot: An exiled magician finds an opportunity for revenge against his enemies muted when his daughter and the son of his chief enemy fall in love in this uniquely structured retelling of the 'The Tempest'.

title: Prospero's Books

tomatoes.consensus: There is no middle ground for viewers of Peter Greenaway's work, but for his fans, Prospero's Books is reliably daring.
